title: How do you use punctuation (i.e ? instead of question mark) when using the text to speech function?
content: My friend is unable to read and write due to a neurological issue. She is using the text to speech output, but when saying 'question mark' this doesn't use a ? but uses the word. This is the same for comma, full stop and any other punctuation.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4
